duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive sales strategies to drive business growth and achieve revenue targets.
Build and manage a network of high-value clients, nurturing relationships and identifying opportunities for collaboration.
Prospect and identify potential leads, leveraging various channels and platforms to expand the client base.
Engage in proactive networking, attending industry events and business functions to promote the company’s services and secure new business relationships.
Utilize CRM tools and platforms to track client interactions, manage leads, and ensure efficient communication and follow-up.
Analyze sales performance data, identifying trends and insights to optimize sales strategies and achieve higher conversion rates.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field (Master's preferred)
